l:dependency.name: PMD Plug-in
l:dependency.l:description: This plug-in generates the trend report for PMD, an open source static code analysis program.

l:dependency.name: Commons BeanUtils
l:dependency.l:description: BeanUtils provides an easy-to-use but flexible wrapper around reflection and introspection.

l:dependency.name: PMD Core
l:dependency.l:description:
PMD is a source code analyzer. It finds common programming flaws like unused variables, empty catch blocks, unnecessary object creation, and so forth. It supports Java, JavaScript, Salesforce.com Apex, PLSQL, Salesforce.com Visualforce, Apache Velocity, XML, XSL.
Additionally it includes CPD, the copy-paste-detector. CPD finds duplicated code in Java, C, C++, C#, Groovy, PHP, Ruby, Fortran, JavaScript, PLSQL, Apache Velocity, Scala, Objective C, Matlab, Python, Go, Swift and Salesforce.com Apex.

l:dependency.name: ASM Core
l:dependency.l:description: A very small and fast Java bytecode manipulation framework

l:dependency.name: jaxen
l:dependency.l:description: Jaxen is a universal Java XPath engine.

l:dependency.name: Commons IO
l:dependency.l:description: The Commons IO library contains utility classes, stream implementations, file filters, file comparators, endian transformation classes, and much more.

l:dependency.name: Commons Logging
l:dependency.l:description: Commons Logging is a thin adapter allowing configurable bridging to other, well known logging systems.

l:dependency.name: JCommander
l:dependency.l:description: A Java framework to parse command line options with annotations.

l:dependency.name: PMD Java
l:dependency.l:description:
PMD is a source code analyzer. It finds common programming flaws like unused variables, empty catch blocks, unnecessary object creation, and so forth. It supports Java, JavaScript, Salesforce.com Apex, PLSQL, Salesforce.com Visualforce, Apache Velocity, XML, XSL.
Additionally it includes CPD, the copy-paste-detector. CPD finds duplicated code in Java, C, C++, C#, Groovy, PHP, Ruby, Fortran, JavaScript, PLSQL, Apache Velocity, Scala, Objective C, Matlab, Python, Go, Swift and Salesforce.com Apex.

l:dependency.name: Apache Commons Digester
l:dependency.l:description: The Apache Commons Digester package lets you configure an XML to Java object mapping module which triggers certain actions called rules whenever a particular pattern of nested XML elements is recognized.

l:dependency.name: JavaCC
l:dependency.l:description: JavaCC is a parser/scanner generator for Java.

l:dependency.name: ASM Core
l:dependency.l:description: A very small and fast Java bytecode manipulation framework
